About the Company: SVC Resources Ltd is engaged in the activities of manufacturing and trading of textile products, especially in manufacturing and trading of suiting and shirting. Besides this, the company is also doing a contract based production of textile goods, which is more popularly known as job work.The company offers their services to customers through industry practices in textile, both by way of manufacturing as well as rental of trading.
